name: visualizacion-barrios
description: Mapa coroplético de barrios de CABA para Looker Studio

scripts.deploy: npm run build && gsutil cp dist/Visualization.js gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/dist/Visualization.js
scripts.deploy:meta: gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/json" gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/Config.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/manifest.json && gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/geo+json" gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrioscaba.geojson
scripts.deploy:assets: gsutil -m cp Config.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/Config.json && gsutil -m cp manifest.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/manifest.json
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:assets && npm run deploy:geojson && npm run deploy:meta
